plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I have leaves, but no hands. I grow tall, but have no bones. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am found in gardens and forests.
🌱 I start as a small seed.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍳 You can cook me in many dishes.

plant.question: I am red and juicy and grow on a vine. I am often used to make sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🍕 I am a popular topping on pizza.

plant.question: I am a type of grass that we eat. You can find me in fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am used to make bread.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am named after a big star.
🌱 Birds and people eat my seeds.

plant.question: I have a trunk but I am not an elephant. I have bark but I am not a dog. I have leaves but I am not a book. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I lose my leaves in the fall sometimes.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and sweet, green flesh. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am named after a bird.
💪 I am high in Vitamin C.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that is long and orange and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad.

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a symbol of love.

plant.question: I am a giant flower that smells like rotting meat. What am I?

hints.text: 💀 My smell attracts flies for pollination.
🌸 I am one of the largest flowers in the world.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I am important for making honey

bug.question: I'm small and red and have black spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People believe I bring good luck
🔴 I am a type of beetle
🪴 You can often find me in a garden

bug.question: I hop around and am green. Sometimes I eat plants.

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually the same color as grass

bug.question: I build my home underground and work together with many others. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very strong for my size
🧺 I can carry many times my own weight

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then turn into something beautiful with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat leaves when I am young

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I eat flies and other bugs

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am a type of beetle
🌙 You can see me at night

bug.question: I can walk on water and have very long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live near ponds and lakes
🚶 I can skip across the water

bug.question: I make a loud buzzing sound and leave behind itchy bites. What am I?
I have a hard shell and can roll into a ball when I am scared. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ I can curl up into a sphere
